item.title: Ep0185: 3 tips
item.itunes:author: Ken Fallon <ken.fallon.nospam@nospam.gmail.com>
item.itunes:summary: More info Tip 1: while [ "x" = "x" ]; do ls -al ; sleep 5; done Tip 2: sox in.mp3 out.ogg tempo 1.5 Tip 3: tar -cf - . | ( cd /media/backupdisk; tar -xvf - )
item.description: More info Tip 1: while [ "x" = "x" ]; do ls -al ; sleep 5; done Tip 2: sox in.mp3 out.ogg tempo 1.5 Tip 3: tar -cf - . | ( cd /media/backupdisk; tar -xvf - )

item.title: Ep0182: LinuxMCE: Interview with Thomas Cherryhomes
item.itunes:author: monsterb <monsterb.nospam@nospam.linuxcranks.info>
item.itunes:summary: LinuxMCE is a free, open source add-on to Kubuntu including a 10' UI, complete whole-house media solution with pvr + distributed media, and the most advanced smarthome solution available. It is stable, easy to use, and requires no knowledge of Linux and only basic computer skills. Links: Home Demo Videos: IRC: irc.freenode.net #linuxmce Ohio LinuxFest 2008 10.11.2008 SouthEast LinuxFest 6.13.2009
item.description: LinuxMCE is a free, open source add-on to Kubuntu including a 10' UI, complete whole-house media solution with pvr + distributed media, and the most advanced smarthome solution available. It is stable, easy to use, and requires no knowledge of Linux and only basic computer skills. Links: Home Demo Videos: IRC: irc.freenode.net #linuxmce Ohio LinuxFest 2008 10.11.2008 SouthEast LinuxFest 6.13.2009
